dmca.title: Request to Google to Remove Links to Images
dmca.body:
[private]
[private]
LAS CRUCES ,NM 88004 
[private]

October 7, 2004

Google, Inc.
[private]
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043


Dear Google, Inc.
In searching your "IMAGES" I have found two photos that belong to me and that I have a Copyright on file with the Library of Congress in Washington, DC I have given no one my permission for these images to be used/ posted anywhere.

As per your request to remove such images from your sites, I am writing this letter to give you the information you need to remove my images.

#1 The two copyrighted images of mine that appear in the search of "IMAGES" using the name "[private]". Both images are appear the same and are listed on different web sites. 
I have tried to contact the webmaster of both sites, one site -- 
www.wwwfindingnemo.com/html/tour.cgi-id=3866 -- has removed my image. The other site I am getting no response from the webmaster and that site is -- www.wwwterminator.com/members/insearch.qw-sea...

#2 The Google search query is in "IMAGES" of "[private]". One image is:

[private] .jpg
120 x 236 pixels - 9k
www.wwwfindingnemo.com/html/tour.cgi-id=3866

http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.wwwfindingnemo.com/thumbs/k/[private].jpg
&imgrefurl=http://www.wwwfindingnemo.com/html/tour.cgi-
id%3D3866&h=236&w=120&sz=9&tbnid=DTqfBPgPBiAJ:&tbnh=102&tbnw=52&start=ll&prev=/i 
mages%3Fq%3D [private] ETS%26hl%3Den%26lr%3D%26safe%3Doff%26sa%3DN


October 7, 2004 
Page 2

And the second image is:

[private].jpeg 
76 x 150 pixels - 4k
www.wwwterminator.com/members/insearch.qw-sea...


http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.wwwterminator.com/members/hothut/Gallery
/All_Celebs/[private].jpeg&imgrefurl=http://www.wwwterminator.com/me 
mbers/insearch.gw-
search%3D [private]%26cat%3D0&h=150&w=76&sz=4&tbnid=SzMIUEdWuhUJ:&tbnh=8 
8&tbnw=45&start=14&prev=/images%3Fg%3D [private]%26hl%3Den%26lr%3D%2 
6safe%3Doff%u26sa%3DN


Please see the attached printed pages of each page and image.

#3	Please contact me at the above address if further information is needed or contact is required.

#4 All the information that I have to contact the owner of the infringing web sites is provided and comes from the links in the Google search.

#5 "I, [private], have a good faith belief and know for certain that use of the copyrighted photographs/materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by me, the copyright owner, or the law."

#6 "I, [private], swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner and am the owner of an exclusive 
right that is allegedly infringed."

Sincerely,
[private]
[private]
LAS CRUCES, NM 88004
